channel.title: REQUEST: Resource Node Foundation Snapping
channel.description:
Hello:
Is it possible to develop a mod that would allow foundations to snap to resource nodes? If so, is anyone willing to develop this mod?
Unfortunately, I have a bit of OCD and like to keep things neat.
